results.title: Protective effects of metformin against aluminum phosphide-induced acute hepato-renal damage in rats: An experimental approach.
results.text_hl: Protective effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ against @CHEMICAL_aluminum_phosphide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C001864 @@@aluminum phosphide@@@-induced acute @<m>DISEASE_Zellweger_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015211 @@@hepato-renal damage@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@: An experimental approach.

citations.NLM: Khezri MR, Varzandeh R, Ghasemnejad-Berenji M. Protective effects of metformin against aluminum phosphide-induced acute hepato-renal damage in rats: An experimental approach. Pestic Biochem Physiol. 2022 Nov;188():105258. PMID: 36464363

results.title: Normalizing Ovulation Rate by Preferential Reduction of Hepato-Visceral Fat in Adolescent Girls With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome.
results.text_hl: We tested whether an intervention targeting the reduction of @<m>DISEASE_Zellweger_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015211 @@@hepato-visceral adiposity@@@ is followed by a higher ovulation rate than OC treatment.

citations.NLM: Ibáñez L, Del Río L, Díaz M, Sebastiani G, Pozo ÓJ, López-Bermejo A, de Zegher F. Normalizing Ovulation Rate by Preferential Reduction of Hepato-Visceral Fat in Adolescent Girls With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome. J Adolesc Health. 2017 Oct;61(4):446-453. PMID: 28712591
